We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Identity _identity;
// In Initialize()
_identity = Identity(symbol, resolution);

// In OnData()
if (_identity.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Is Ready", _identity.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Warm Up Period", _identity.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Current", _identity.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Name", _identity.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Samples", _identity.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.identity = self.Identity(symbol, resolution)

# In OnData()
if self.identity.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Is Ready", self.identity.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Warm Up Period", self.identity.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Current", self.identity.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Name", self.identity.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "Identity Samples", self.identity.Samples);
